articles.title: I've been called 'half-breed' and 'mutt.' I'm a biracial Asian woman and proud - CBC.ca
articles.description: Emily Wong of Pembroke, Ont., writes about growing up biracial in a small town and why she wants her kids to connect with their Asian heritage.
articles.content:
This First Person article is the experience of Emily Wong, a biracial woman who grew up in Pembroke, Ont. For more information about CBC's First Person stories, please see the FAQ
